thread.title: Don't Hang Up - Damien Macé & Alexis Wajsbrot
thread.title_full: Don't Hang Up - Damien Macé & Alexis Wajsbrot

title: Don't Hang Up - Damien Macé & Alexis Wajsbrot
text: by Casto24 I didn't think a movie would have me this on the edge of my seat since the classic horrors came out. A must watch 10/10. Turn the lights off, gather a friend and prepare for the perfect anxiety filled-blood boiling night in. Best Movies I've Seen on iTunes in a While by Movie Buff1234567890987654321 This was good because it was full of suspense and creepiness. Although a bit of it could be predicted, there was only a modest amount that, and frankly, I believe the director wanted it that way. Overall, really enjoyed the suspense and MUCH better than anything I've seen lately, including Don't Know Twice....though that was a solid flick, in my opinion. SHOCKING by JordanAHoskins I WAS NOT EXPECTING ALL THE PLOT TWISTS AND I WAS SCARED AF DURING THE WHOLE THING! GARRETT CLAYTON AND GREGG SULKIN ACTED THEIR ASSES OFF
